nanomsg.async

Class AsyncSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • nanomsg.async.AsyncSocket

  • public class AsyncSocket
extends java.lang.Object
    Experimental socket proxy that enables async way to send or receive data from socket.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AsyncSocket(Socket socket)
      Given any Socket subclass create new AsyncSocket instance.
      AsyncSocket(Socket socket, IAsyncScheduler scheduler)
      Given any Socket subclass create new AsyncSocket instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void recv(IAsyncCallback<java.nio.ByteBuffer> callback)
      Given a callback, it try receive data from socket using the common defined executor and execute callback whet any data received.
      void recvBytes(IAsyncCallback<byte[]> callback)
      Given a callback, it try receive data from socket using the common defined executor and execute callback whet any data received.
      void recvString(IAsyncCallback<java.lang.String> callback)
      Given a callback, it try receive data from socket using the common defined executor and execute callback whet any data received.
      void send(byte[] data, IAsyncCallback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
      Given a byte array and callback, sends data using a proxied socket using a common executor and execute a callback when it are finished.
      void send(java.nio.ByteBuffer data, IAsyncCallback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
      Given a bytebuffer and callback, sends data using a proxied socket using a common executor and execute a callback when it are finished.
      void send(java.lang.String data, IAsyncCallback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
      Given a string and callback, sends data using a proxied socket using a common executor and execute a callback when it are finished.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Given a string and callback, sends data using a proxied socket using a common executor and execute a callback when it are finished.
        Parameters:
        data - string to send.
        callback - IAsyncCallback interface object.
